attributes.action: Keep forecourt prices in check to prevent fuel theft.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With Petrol and Diesel prices keeping on rising a new problem is becoming more visible and has now happened to a few people that I know.  They have woken up in the morning to find out the fuel tank is empty because someone has drilled into the tank and drained the fuel out of the vehicle.

With fuel prices going up and this sort of crime being more visible my petiton to the government is to please keep the fuel prices in check so that is not attactive and profitible for criminals to steal fuel directly from vehicle fuel tanks.
